amendment.description: Amendment requires that the state criminal penalty for failure to comply with registry requirements shall be a minimum term of imprisonment that is no less than 90 days.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to provide for a minimum term of not less than 90 days when jurisdictions are imposing criminal penalties for failure to comply with the provisions of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
